title: KHR_materials_iridescence glTF extension
description: glTF extension that defines an iridescence effect.

iridescenceTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The iridescence intensity texture. Stored in channel R with default linear value 1.0 of the iridescence texture.

thinFilmIOR.description: The index of refraction of the dielectric thin-film layer.

baseExtinctionCoefficient.description: The extinction coefficient of the base material.
baseExtinctionCoefficient.gltf_detailedDescription: The extinction coefficient of the base (conductor) material. Together with the base IOR, this builds the complex IOR of the conductor.

thinFilmThicknessMinimum.description: The minimum thickness of the thin-film layer.

thinFilmThicknessMaximum.description: The maximum thickness of the thin-film layer.
thinFilmThicknessMaximum.gltf_detailedDescription: The maximum thickness of the thin-film layer. This value will be used as the overall thickness if no thinFilmThicknessTexture is provided.

thinFilmThicknessTexture.description: The thickness texture of the thin-film layer to blend between the minimum and maximum thickness.
thinFilmThicknessTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The thickness texture of the thin-film layer to blend between the minimum and maximum thickness. Stored in channel G with default linear value 1.0 of the iridescence texture.
